metadata.title: CVE-2021-35065 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
The glob-parent package before 6.0.1 for Node.js allows ReDoS (regularexpression denial of service) attacks against the enclosure regularexpression.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-35065` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-glob-parent - 6.0.2+~5.1.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-glob-parent package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.2+~5.1.1-1').
